body:
You remember Serleena first scene just when she landed on earth and gulped down that burglar the came at the camera with a huge sloshing belly?
Yeah that was the beggining for me
Rewatched that scene a lot of times without knowing why...
Cell absorbing 18 was the first real strong experience I can remember. It was kinda hot for some reason, and it just went from there.

As a vore fetishist I wanted to expand on the previous comment, for me I got awakened before puberty and before I even learned about sex and such from cartoons. I got fascinated by it, (ex: the robot fish that eats Mario and Luigi in the super show thing, I repeated that scene again and again with the DVD). I'm sure others found it in a different way, but that's how I found mine before 10 years old.

Makes you wonder how Vore fetishists acquired their kink. Did the 8 year old them just happen to go in a park, watch a frog gulp down a whole grasshopper in three bites, and it just sorta awakened something in them later in life?
*sips the whole bottle of unsee juice
